meteoroids.Meteoroids.controllers.gameobjects

Class AsteroidController

  • java.lang.Object
    • meteoroids.Meteoroids.controllers.gameobjects.AsteroidController

  • public class AsteroidController
extends java.lang.Object
    Asteroid controller for managing asteroids. Manages destroying and creating single and multiple asteroids.
    Author:
    vpyyhtia

    • Constructor Detail

      • AsteroidController

        public AsteroidController()
        Constructor for AsteroidController. Initializes default values for starting mass and radius for asteroids and also the spawning time.

    • Method Detail

      • destroyAsteroid

        public java.util.List<Asteroid> destroyAsteroid(Asteroid asteroid)
        Destroys an asteroid and creates two smaller one from it. If new size for the asteroids would be smaller than 3.0, then there won't be any new asteroids.
        Parameters:
        asteroid - to be destroyed
        Returns:
        list of asteroids

      • getAsteroids

        public Asteroid[] getAsteroids(int numberOfAsteroids,
                               float mass,
                               float size)
        Creates randomly new asteroids to the game window.
        Parameters:
        numberOfAsteroids - that will be generated
        mass - of the new asteroids
        size - of the asteroids (radius)
        Returns:
        array of new Asteroids

      • generateNewAsteroids

        public Asteroid[] generateNewAsteroids(float deltaTime)
        Generates two new asteroids if asteroid time counter has dropped to zero. Every time this method is called, asteroid time counter will be decreased by delta time. After new generated asteroids, next ones will be even bigger. Maximum size for new asteroids is 150 in radius.
        Parameters:
        deltaTime -
        Returns:
        array of Asteroids

      • createAsteroid

        public Asteroid createAsteroid(float posX,

        Parameters:

        posY -
        mass -
        size -
        Returns:
        Asteroid
